text:
/o Mr. Dean Gregory,
Apt. 2H,
500 Riverside Drive,
New York 27, N.Y.
July 24th 1963
Dear Mr. Fellows,
Thank you very much for the July check. It is most
kind of you to send it so early.
I enclose the completed Certificate of Non-
Residence in the District of Columbia.
Yours sincerely,
/C c'x
Margery Morris
